name: BusinessUSA
description: Too often, interactions with the government are burdensome and frustrating. From seeking out financing opportunities to learning about the latest regulations affecting them, hard-working businesses are spending too much time navigating the federal bureaucracy. On October 28, 2011, the President issued a challenge to government agencies to think beyond their organizational boundaries in the best interest of serving Americas business community, and start thinking and acting more like the businesses they serve.
